description: Create or update a gallery Image Version.

gallery_image_name.description: The name of the gallery Image Definition in which the Image Version is to be created.

gallery_image_version_name.description: The name of the gallery Image Version to be created. Needs to follow semantic version name pattern: The allowed characters are digit and period. Digits must be within the range of a 32-bit integer. Format: ..

gallery_image_version.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update gallery Image Version operation.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

gallery_name.description: The name of the Shared Image Gallery in which the Image Definition resides.
